issue.title: [Java] Provide guidance in documentation for using Arrow in an uberjar setting
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-799](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-799). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, ArrowBuf class directly access the package-private fields of AbstractByteBuf class which makes shading Apache Arrow problematic. If we relocate io.netty namespace excluding io.netty.buffer.ArrowBuf, it would throw out IllegalAccessException.
